Params: {2: 'Should we just check out both of them?', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm afraid we don't have the luxury of time for that.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Lee, what's your thought?", 3: '12', 4: "Lucia, it's up to you!", 5: '13', 6: 'Liv, any thought?', 7: '14'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't have enough clues to say much. They look the same.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There are a lot of enemies on the right. We might be able to walk away with quite some clues.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I think we should go left. It feels more peaceful.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Seems like the boy and Roland both went left, but...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I see the projection of a female scavenger there, and I don't know why it's bothering me so much...", 4: '1'}
